abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column describes deal played during d'Orsi Senior Bowl world team championships in Veldhoven, the Netherlands.
snippet: At the world team championships on Friday, France defeated U.S.A.-2 to win the d’Orsi Senior Bowl by 165 international match points to 160.3.
lead_paragraph: At the world team championships on Friday, France defeated U.S.A.-2 to win the d’Orsi Senior Bowl by 165 international match points to 160.3.

headline.main: After Waging a Seesaw Battle, France Wins the Senior Bowl
headline.print_headline: After Waging a Seesaw Battle, France Wins the Senior Bowl
